review: Ummm, not much to say about with this 20 minute vn, unless I'm missing something there isn't really an ending nor a real story, had more fun watching her fail then continue through the 'story'.

If you're looking for a darker visual novel, then this is it, throughout you will be confronted with decisions that will result in tragedy or bitter-sweet loss... This visual novel took my heart strings and yanked them out, yet I do not regret playing it.
